comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC -- you have misspelled De Palma's name in your title. Also, Bain's caption uses "through," not "thru."

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: The 1914 Vanderbilt race was held in Santa Monica, California, on February 26. Ralph De Palma won. Story in The New York Times, February 27, 1914: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9A04E5DE163AE6...
